testcase.name: Given Gorest application is running
When When I create a new user by providing the information name "Kiran" email "kiran1@gmail.com" gender "Female" status "Active"token"<token>"
Then I verify that the user with "Kiran" is created
And I update the user with information name "Kiran" email "kiran1@gmail.com" gender "Female" status "Active"
And The user is updated successfully
And I delete the user with userId
Then The user deleted successfully from the application
| Kiran | kiran1@gmail.com | Female | Active |

And I delete the user with userId
